mapper.select: SELECT B_NO, B_TITLE, B_DESCRIPTION, ( SELECT Z.USER_NAME FROM JR_DB.EMP Z WHERE B_AUTHOR = Z.USER_NO ) AS B_AUTHOR, DATE_FORMAT(B_CREATE_TIME, '%Y/%m/%d/ %H:%i') AS B_CREATE_TIME, DATE_FORMAT(B_UPLOAD_TIME, '%Y/%m/%d/ %H:%i') AS B_UPLOAD_TIME, B_HIT, B_NOTICE, B_USE_YN, B_TYPE, B_DELETE_TIME FROM JR_DB.BOARD_COLLUSION ORDER BY B_NO DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{paging}
